text: Kodiinumulikuchitamanthakupereka chaulere chanu musanakumane naye? Ngati nditero, musachite mantha chifukwa Mulungu wakukhululukirani. Motero pitirizani kupemphera nthawi zonse, perekani msonkho wothandiza osauka, ndipo mverani Mulungu ndi Mtumwi wake. Ndithudi Mulungu amadziwa ntchito zanu zonse
